data.system_settings: Macbook Pro 10,1 (Retina, 15" early 2013), Mac OS X El Capitan 10.11.6, Discord Mac client v0.0.247, Focusrite Saffire MixControl 3.7, Saffire Pro 24 Firmware version 2761
data.actual_result: Audio only plays through Output channel 1 (Left side of stereo output)
data.expected_result: Audio from Discord plays through Output channels 1 and 2 at equal levels
data.short_description: general Discord audio outputs only to one audio channel on external audio interface
data.steps_to_repro: - Use Focusrite Saffire Pro 24 as system output device - Play any audio from Discord (inculdes notifications and voice channel audio) - Comment: Reproducibility probably very low due to practical reasons relating to specialised hardware
